document_data.name: ''Potion of Fortitude''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of fortitude''''', also known as '''''elixirs of fortitude''''', were a type of [[potion]] that made the imbiber tougher and harder to injure.
document_data.Description: These potions had a viscous consistency and were fuchsia in color.
document_data.Powers: Upon imbibing these potions sent a surge of energy through the imbibers body, temporarily increasing their body's constitution.
document_data.Availability:
* In the city of [[Athkatla]], ''circa'' [[1372 DR]], one could purchase ''potions of fortitude'' from [[Ribald Barterman]] in his store [[Adventurer Mart]] and in the [[Athkatla/Bridge District|Bridge]] district from the potion vendor [[Mrs. Cragmoon]].
* In the city of [[Waterdeep]], one could find ''potions of fortitude'' for sale at [[Sorcerous Sundries]].
